# Loading data

We're gonna look at NYC Airbnb data.

```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```


```{r}
data("ny_noaa")

ny_noaa_tidy =
  ny_noaa %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  separate(col = date, into = c('year','month','day'), sep = "-" , convert = TRUE) %>% 
  mutate(
     month = month.name[month],
     prcp = prcp / 10,
     tmax = as.numeric(tmax),
     tmin = as.numeric(tmin),
     tmax = tmax / 10,
     tmin = tmin / 10
  ) 
```
